metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8001 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there exists a heap-based buffer over-read vulnerabilityin UnescapeName() in PdfName.cpp. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial-of-service or possibly unspecified otherimpact via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
